Input: 어제 우리반과 옆반의 설정온도 차이 알려줘

Tags.SQL_Q:
SELECT "settemp",
  (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 day') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (
 SELECT settemp, (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 day') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp ), t AS (
  SELECT AVG(CASE WHEN idu_name = '01_IB5' THEN settemp END) AS settemp_ours,
         AVG(CASE WHEN idu_name = '01_IB7' THEN settemp END) AS settemp_beside
  FROM qr
)
SELECT settemp_ours,
       settemp_beside,
       settemp_ours - settemp_beside AS settemp_diff
FROM t;

Tags.SQL_O:

Input: 이번달 중 우리반 온도가 가장 덜 더운날이 언제야?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 month') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
/* ① 월-전체 → qr
   ② 최저 온도 minv
   ③ 그 온도와 같은 행 중 날짜만 추려 unique_dates */
WITH qr AS (SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 month') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp),
     minv AS (
       SELECT MIN(roomtemp) AS coldest_temp FROM qr
     ),
     unique_dates AS (
       SELECT DISTINCT DATE("timestamp") AS d
       FROM   qr, minv
       WHERE  qr.roomtemp = minv.coldest_temp
     )
SELECT ARRAY_AGG(TO_CHAR(d,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY d) AS coldest_dates,
       (SELECT coldest_temp FROM minv)              AS coldest_temp
FROM   unique_dates;

Input: 2주전 우리반과 옆반 합쳐서 설정온도가 가장 낮은날이 언제야?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '2 week') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 week') AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (SELECT "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '2 week') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 week') AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp),
coldest AS (
  SELECT MIN(settemp) AS coldest_temp
  FROM qr
)
SELECT ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT TO_CHAR("timestamp", 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR("timestamp", 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS coldest_dates,
       (SELECT coldest_temp FROM coldest) AS coldest_temp
FROM qr
WHERE settemp = (SELECT coldest_temp FROM coldest);

Input: 에어컨 꺼진 방들 알려줘

Tags.SQL_Q:
SELECT oper,
       (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name,
       "timestamp"
FROM   data_t
WHERE  idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5','01_IB7','02_I81'))
  AND  "timestamp" >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
  AND  "timestamp" <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  AND  oper IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY timestamp;
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (SELECT oper,
       (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name,
       "timestamp"
FROM   data_t
WHERE  idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5','01_IB7','02_I81'))
  AND  "timestamp" >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
  AND  "timestamp" <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  AND  oper IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY timestamp), latest AS (
  SELECT idu_name,
         oper,
         "timestamp",
         ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY idu_name ORDER BY "timestamp" DESC) AS rn
  FROM qr
)
SELECT ARRAY_AGG(idu_name ORDER BY idu_name) AS off_names
FROM latest
WHERE rn = 1
  AND oper = FALSE;

Input: 지난주 설정온도가 실내온도보다 더 높았던 날은?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "roomtemp", "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 week') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH daily AS (SELECT "roomtemp", "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 week') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp)
SELECT ARRAY_AGG(d ORDER BY d) AS dates
FROM (
  SELECT DATE("timestamp") AS d,
         AVG(settemp) AS avg_settemp,
         AVG(roomtemp) AS avg_roomtemp
  FROM daily
  GROUP BY DATE("timestamp")
) AS aggregated
WHERE avg_settemp > avg_roomtemp;

Input: 어제 우리반 에어컨 작동 시간 알려줘

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "oper", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 day') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "oper" IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH on_events AS (
  SELECT "timestamp"
  FROM (
    SELECT "oper", "timestamp" FROM "data_t"
    WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5'))
      AND "timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 day')
      AND "timestamp" < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30')
      AND "oper" IS NOT NULL
  ) sub
  WHERE "oper" = TRUE
  ORDER BY "timestamp"
), periods AS (
  SELECT LEAD("timestamp") OVER (ORDER BY "timestamp") AS next_t,
         "timestamp" AS t
  FROM on_events
)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (next_t - t))), 0) / 3600 AS total_time_in_hours
FROM periods
WHERE next_t IS NOT NULL;

Input: 우리반, 옆반, 앞반 중 가장 추운 방은?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7', '02_I81')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7', '02_I81')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp),
ht AS (
  SELECT MIN(roomtemp) AS coldest_temp FROM qr
)
SELECT ARRAY(
         SELECT DISTINCT idu_name          -- 중복 제거
         FROM   qr, ht
         WHERE  qr.roomtemp = ht.coldest_temp
         ORDER  BY idu_name                -- 보기 좋게 정렬
       ) AS coldest_rooms,
       (SELECT coldest_temp FROM ht) AS coldest_temp
FROM   ht;

Input: 에어컨 제일 세게 킨 방 3개 알려줘

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "oper", "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7', '02_I81')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' AND "oper" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (SELECT "oper", "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7', '02_I81')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' AND "oper" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp), latest AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM qr
  WHERE "timestamp" = (SELECT MAX("timestamp") FROM qr)
    AND oper = TRUE
), ranked AS (

         settemp,
         ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY settemp ASC) AS r
  FROM latest
)
SELECT ARRAY(SELECT idu_name FROM ranked WHERE r <= 3) AS top3_rooms,
       ARRAY(SELECT settemp  FROM ranked WHERE r <= 3) AS top3_temps;

WITH qr AS (SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('year', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 year') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('year', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp), monthly AS (

Input: 지난달에 설정온도랑 현재온도 차이가 제일 많이 났던 때는 언제야?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "settemp", "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 month') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30') AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (
  SELECT "settemp",
         "roomtemp",
         (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name,
         "timestamp",
         roomtemp - settemp AS temp_diff
  FROM "data_t"
  WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5'))
    AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 month')
    AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2022-09-30')
    AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL
    AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN'
    AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL
    AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN'
  ORDER BY timestamp
), t AS (
  SELECT MAX(temp_diff) AS max_diff FROM qr
)
SELECT ARRAY(SELECT TO_CHAR("timestamp", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM qr, t WHERE qr.temp_diff = t.max_diff) AS max_diff_timestamps,
       ARRAY(SELECT "settemp"  FROM qr, t WHERE qr.temp_diff = t.max_diff) AS max_diff_settemps,
       ARRAY(SELECT "roomtemp" FROM qr, t WHERE qr.temp_diff = t.max_diff) AS max_diff_roomtemps,
       max_diff
FROM   t;

Input: 옆반 어제 아침과 저녁의 설정온도 차이는 얼마나 돼?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 day') + INTERVAL '6 hours' AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '1 day') + INTERVAL '9 hours' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH parts AS (
  SELECT settemp,
         part
  FROM  (
    SELECT settemp,
           CASE
             WHEN date_part('hour', "timestamp") BETWEEN 6  AND 8  THEN 'morning'
             WHEN date_part('hour', "timestamp") BETWEEN 18 AND 20 THEN 'evening'
           END AS part,
           "timestamp"
    FROM   data_t
    WHERE  idu_id = (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name = '01_IB7')
      AND  "timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day')
      AND  "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE)
      AND  settemp IS NOT NULL
      AND  settemp IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN'
    ORDER BY timestamp
  ) sub
  WHERE part IS NOT NULL
), agg AS (
  SELECT AVG(CASE WHEN part = 'morning' THEN settemp END) AS morning_avg,
         AVG(CASE WHEN part = 'evening' THEN settemp END) AS evening_avg
  FROM   parts
)
SELECT morning_avg,
       evening_avg,
       evening_avg - morning_avg AS temp_diff
FROM   agg;

Tags.SQL_O:
WITH qr AS (SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-30 12:00:00' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp),
     ts AS (
       SELECT MAX("timestamp") AS ts FROM qr
     ),
     latest AS (
       SELECT idu_name,
              roomtemp
       FROM   qr JOIN ts ON qr."timestamp" = ts.ts
     ),
     pivot AS (
       SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN idu_name = '01_IB5' THEN roomtemp END) AS roomtemp_ours,
              MAX(CASE WHEN idu_name = '01_IB7' THEN roomtemp END) AS roomtemp_beside
       FROM   latest
     )
SELECT roomtemp_ours,
       roomtemp_beside,
       ABS(roomtemp_ours - roomtemp_beside) AS roomtemp_diff,
       CASE WHEN roomtemp_ours < roomtemp_beside THEN '01_IB5' ELSE '01_IB7' END AS colder_idu
FROM   pivot;

Input: 우리 반 에어컨이 가장 오래 작동했던 날은 언제야?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "oper", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '7 day') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 day') AND "oper" IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT "oper",
         (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name,
         "timestamp",
         LAG("timestamp") OVER (ORDER BY "timestamp") AS prev_ts
  FROM   "data_t"
  WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5'))
    AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' - INTERVAL '7 day')
    AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('day', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 day')
    AND "oper" IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY "timestamp"
), spans AS (
  SELECT DATE("timestamp") AS d,
         CASE WHEN oper AND prev_ts IS NOT NULL
              THEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM ("timestamp" - prev_ts))
              ELSE 0 END AS on_secs
  FROM   base
), daily AS (
  SELECT d,
         SUM(on_secs) AS on_seconds
  FROM   spans
  GROUP  BY d
), t AS (
  SELECT MAX(on_seconds) AS longest
  FROM   daily
)
SELECT ARRAY(SELECT TO_CHAR(d,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM daily, t WHERE daily.on_seconds = t.longest) AS longest_oper_dates,
       (longest / 3600.0) AS longest_oper_time_in_hours
FROM   t;

Input: 오늘 아침과 저녁의 온도차이는 얼마나 돼?

Tags.SQL_Q:
SELECT roomtemp,
       "timestamp"
FROM   data_t
WHERE  idu_id = (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name = '01_IB5')
  AND  (
       ("timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '6 hours'  AND
        "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '9 hours')  OR
       ("timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '18 hours' AND
        "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '21 hours')
      )
  AND  roomtemp IS NOT NULL
  AND  roomtemp IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN'
ORDER BY "timestamp";
Tags.SQL_O:
/* ① 하루치 데이터를 qr 로 모은 뒤
   ② 아침·저녁 평균을 각각 계산
   ③ 한 행으로 아침·저녁 평균과 차이를 반환 */
WITH qr AS (SELECT roomtemp,
       "timestamp"
FROM   data_t
WHERE  idu_id = (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name = '01_IB5')
  AND  (
       ("timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '6 hours'  AND
        "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '9 hours')  OR
       ("timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '18 hours' AND
        "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '21 hours')
      )
  AND  roomtemp IS NOT NULL
  AND  roomtemp IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN'
ORDER BY "timestamp"),
     morning AS (
       SELECT AVG(roomtemp) AS v
       FROM   qr
       WHERE  "timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '6 hours'
         AND  "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '9 hours'
     ),
     evening AS (
       SELECT AVG(roomtemp) AS v
       FROM   qr
       WHERE  "timestamp" >= DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '18 hours'
         AND  "timestamp" <  DATE_TRUNC('day', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '21 hours'
     )
SELECT morning.v                AS morning_avg,
       evening.v                AS evening_avg,
       evening.v - morning.v    AS temp_diff
FROM   morning, evening;

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "roomtemp", "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 week') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
WITH daily AS (SELECT "roomtemp", "settemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('01_IB5')) AND timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30') AND timestamp < DATE_TRUNC('week', DATE '2022-09-30' + INTERVAL '1 week') AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' AND "settemp" IS NOT NULL AND "settemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp)
SELECT ARRAY_AGG(d ORDER BY d) AS dates
FROM (
  SELECT DATE("timestamp") AS d,
         AVG(settemp) AS avg_settemp,
         AVG(roomtemp) AS avg_roomtemp
  FROM daily
  GROUP BY DATE("timestamp")
) AS aggregated
WHERE avg_settemp < avg_roomtemp;

Tags.SQL_O:

     ),

Input: 4층에서 가장 추운 방은 어디야?

Tags.SQL_Q: SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('02_I84', '02_I85', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-17 16:30:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-17 16:30:00' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp
Tags.SQL_O:
/* ① 5분 이내 데이터 → qr
   ② 가장 최신 시각 구해 ts
   ③ 최신 시각의 측정값만 추려 now1
   ④ 최저 온도 한 값만 구해 minv
   ⑤ 그 최저 온도를 갖는 방 이름을 중복 없이 모아 반환 */
WITH qr AS (SELECT "roomtemp", (SELECT name FROM idu_t WHERE id = data_t.idu_id) AS idu_name, "timestamp" FROM "data_t" WHERE idu_id IN (SELECT id FROM idu_t WHERE name IN ('02_I84', '02_I85', '01_IB7')) AND timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-17 16:30:00' - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND timestamp <= TIMESTAMP '2022-09-17 16:30:00' AND "roomtemp" IS NOT NULL AND "roomtemp" IS DISTINCT FROM 'NaN' ORDER BY timestamp),
     ht AS (
  SELECT MIN(roomtemp) AS coldest_temp FROM qr
)
SELECT ARRAY(
         SELECT DISTINCT idu_name          -- 중복 제거
         FROM   qr, ht
         WHERE  qr.roomtemp = ht.coldest_temp
         ORDER  BY idu_name                -- 보기 좋게 정렬
       ) AS coldest_rooms,
       coldest_temp
FROM   ht;
